/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban architecture. A traffic light stands sentinel at the intersection, guiding the flow of vehicles and pedestrians. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the blend of urban development and natural elements.
